item.title: [PI]Dragon kiteshield custom makes my character invisible[PI]
item.dc:creator: @bluedevil666 bluedevil666
item.description:
@bluedevil666 wrote:

Hello I’ve recently added a new custom, a “Dragon Kiteshield”
I do not know if it is something with the animation of this custom
Here are the ints.
if(i == 15005) {
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wield”;
itemDef.name = “Dragon kiteshield”;
itemDef.description = “A rare, protective kiteshield.”.getBytes();
itemDef.modelID = 13701;
itemDef.modelZoom = 1560;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 344;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1104;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -6;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = -14;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = 65007;
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 65007;
}

I’d really appreciate it if I could get immediate help or very close.
thanks,
bluedevil666

Read full topic
